text: Miguel Ángel Hernández Ortiz (born July 19, 1984), is a Chilean footballer, and currently plays for Santiago Morning in the Primera División Chilena. ==External links== * Miguel Hernández Ortíz at Football Lineups Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean Primera División players Category:Universidad de Concepción footballers Category:Universidad de Chile footballers Category:Santiago Morning footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Association football midfielders
title: Miguel Hernández Ortiz
